mapper.update: insert into task_log (task_id, status, action, msg) values (#{taskId}, #{status}, #{action}, #{msg})
update task set start_time=current_timestamp() where id=#{id}
update task set status='DONE', end_time=current_timestamp() where id=#{id};
update task set stopped=1 where id=#{id}
update task set restart=0 where id=#{id}
update task set restart=1, start_time=null where id=#{id}

update task set restart=true, start_time=null -- where status not in ('INIT', 'DONE', 'SCHEMA_FAILED', 'DATA_FAILED', 'VERIFICATION_FAILED') where status != 'INIT' and status != 'DONE' and status != 'SCHEMA_FAILED' and status != 'DATA_FAILED' and status != 'VERIFICATION_FAILED' and stopped=0 and deleted=0;
mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.job_id as job_id, a.db_id as db_id, a.table_id as table_id, a.db_name as db_name, a.table_name as table_name, a.type as type, a.status as status, b.partition_id as partition_id from task as a left outer join task_partition as b on a.id = b.task_id where a.id=#{id}
select `id`, `status`, `action`, `msg`, `create_time` as createTime, `update_time` as updateTime from task_log where task_id=#{taskId} order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into task_partition (job_id, task_id, partition_id) values (#{jobId}, #{taskId}, #{partitionId})
mapper.select: select id from task order by id desc limit 1

select id, job_id, table_id, db_id, status from task
